function.name: find_academic_info
function.description: Finds academic information from educational institutions and professional organizations. Use this for searching degree requirements, prerequisites, admission criteria, and academic program details from other universities and educational institutions.

query.description: A focused academic search query targeting educational institutions' websites and academic resources

market.description: The market to search in, typically en-US unless searching international programs

category.description: The category of academic information being searched

function.name: find_career_info
function.description: Searches for career-related information including job market trends, professional requirements, and industry standards. Use this for gathering information about career paths, job prospects, and professional certifications.

query.description: A career-focused search query targeting professional and industry resources

market.description: The market to search in, typically en-US for domestic job markets

focus.description: The specific aspect of career information being searched

function.name: find_research_opportunities
function.description: Searches for academic research opportunities, internships, and professional development programs. Use this for finding information about summer programs, research positions, and educational enrichment opportunities.

query.description: A search query focused on finding research and professional development opportunities

market.description: The market to search in, typically en-US unless searching international opportunities

type.description: The type of opportunity being searched

function.name: find_grad_school_info
function.description: Searches for graduate school information including admission requirements, test requirements, and program details. Use this for finding information about graduate programs, professional schools, and advanced degree requirements.

query.description: A search query focused on graduate school and professional program information

market.description: The market to search in, typically en-US unless searching international programs
